Package com.mrjaffesclass.apcs.messages

This package implements a messaging system used for communication between Model, View, and Controller in a program using an MVC framework.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
MessageMailbox Implement this interface for the class that wants to subscribe to messages.
 

Class Summary
MessageControllerTest A test runner controller to test the message implementation
MessageObject Contains a message name and a list of controllers that subscribe to the message
MessagePayloadTest This is a representative class that can be sent with the message as the message payload.
MessageTest Test runner for Messages Instantiating the class will create three test controllers.
Messaging Implements messaging between controllers
 

Package com.mrjaffesclass.apcs.messages Description

This package implements a messaging system used for communication between Model, View, and Controller in a program using an MVC framework. Instantiate an instance of the Messaging class and use the methods listed in the Messaging class to send and subscribe to messages
